subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Celtics, winners of a franchise-record 19 straight games and off to the best two-loss start in N.B.A. history, will play a Christmas Day matchup with the Lakers.
snippet: The Celtics, winners of a franchise-record 19 straight games and off to the best two-loss start in N.B.A. history, will play a Christmas Day matchup with the Lakers.
